text: Uye (Muhammad (SAW)) yambira vanhu nezve zuva richauya marwadzo kwavari; uye vaiti vezvakaipa vachati: “Tenzi vedu! Tipeiwo kanguva kadiki, tichadavira kudana kwenyu uye kutevera vatumwa!” (Zvichanzi): “Hamuna here mushure kupika kuti hamusi kuzobva (munyika muchienda kuhupenyu hwamangwana)?”
